Service Details: - Offers an accessible, door-to-door shared transit service to people with permanent or temporary disabilities that prevent them from using fixed-route transit without assistance from another person- The handyDART picks you up at your accessible door and drops you off at the accessible door of your destination ** Please Note:  Pre-registration is required before using this service
Hours: Available handyDART Booking Times:  - Mon-Fri, 9:15am - 8:00pm- Sat: 9:00am - 4:00pm- No service Sun or holidays. ** Please Note:  Dialysis patients can book earlier timesOffice Hours:  - Mon-Fri: 8:00am - 4:30pm
Eligibility: HandyPASS eligibility is based on type of disability and how it affects the applicant's ability or inability to use regular bus service
How to Apply: Call for more information or download registration form from the website
Address & Map: 1494 Hardy StKelowna, BC     V1Y 8H2View MapQuest Map
